Course.Name: Comp Graphics and Interactive Systems
Course.Description: Presents fundamental concepts of computer graphics. Topics include display hardware, transformations, geometric modeling, shading two- and three-dimensional display algorithms and graphics software systems.
Course.Prerequisite: CSCI-3333 or CMPE-3333, Consent of instructor
Course.Restrictions: dnu-MED in Educational Admin, MPA in Public Administration, Bus. Admin -Accelerated online, Can not be in the English Institute level
Course.Course-attributes: Degree Elective, CS Instruction Fee - HU
